tweet_text: @gregarious Agreed, and think that this is a great start. It still feels too linear. It doesn't adequately capture what happens as more of these creator types unlock the opportunity to build their own network effect – creating more value for their members with each new person who joins.

tweet_text:
@CMPG Well done guys, ignore the negative comments from all the F1 drivers, I'll bet none of them have even seen a race track never mind driven on one. 
Tailgating is extremely dangerous, someone ran into the back of my car and injured my 10 year old daughter, only minor but..Think on.
